text:
So being an FX Artist, me reel is all based around Houdini. The first half consists of the projects I’ve done. Be it dirt simulations to set a horse into a VFX plate. Then to a masterclass I did with assists from DNEG. As well as a personal project of a boat dock. Which I took from fx all the way to rendered.
The second half is a tool I created to speed up the meshing process of water.

I’ve been applying at all sorts of places. ILM, DNEG, Framestore. I’ve got an interview as a runner at The Mill on Monday
